content.raw:
This is good.  Saw the comments in Slack:

```
In order to run faster than real-time, cloudsim needs to pass the cloudsim_sim docker container the command line parameter: update_rate:=1000000

With this, simulations are now ending 1.5-2.5 hours after starting. We should lower the maximum real-time limit a simulation can run for, to help save costs (with simulations run overnight, etc.)
```
content.html:
This is good. Saw the comments in Slack:

In order to run faster than real-time, cloudsim needs to pass the cloudsim_sim docker container the command line parameter: update_rate:=1000000

With this, simulations are now ending 1.5-2.5 hours after starting. We should lower the maximum real-time limit a simulation can run for, to help save costs (with simulations run overnight, etc.)
